Title: Chairman Mao's heart and ours are one
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: Mao visits Shanghai Steel Plant no.3. For a similar image, seen the 1970 poster 'Chairman Mao inspects the Shanghai Steelworks'. Both are based on Jin Shangyi's 1969 painting "Chairman Mao inspects  Shanghai Steel Plant no. 3 (毛主席视察上钢三厂).
